```{r}
#Libraries needed (maybe?)
rm(list = ls())
library(isdas)
library(spatstat)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(rgdal)
library(sf)
```

```{r}
#Neighbourhood shp
wd <- getwd()

nshp <- st_read(paste(wd, "/Neighbourhoods.shp", sep = ""))

st_drivers()

ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data = nshp, size = 1, color = "black", fill = "cyan1") + 
  ggtitle("Neighbourhoods") + 
  coord_sf()


```
```{r}
#Covid Cases
covidcases <- read_csv(paste(wd,"/COVID19 cases.csv", sep=""))
```
